performance.title: Prioritize Foreground Apps
performance.description: Adjusts Win32 priority to give the active application more CPU resources.

performance.title: Optimize Memory Management
performance.description: Keeps core system code in memory and enables a larger system cache.

performance.title: Disable Power Throttling
performance.description: Globally prevents Windows from throttling applications to save power.

performance.title: Disable Spectre/Meltdown Mitigations
performance.description: Disables CPU security mitigations. Can improve performance but reduces security. Apply with caution.

network.title: Disable Network Throttling
network.description: Removes the network throttling index, ensuring maximum network throughput.

network.title: Flush DNS Cache
network.description: Clears the local DNS cache. Resolves network connectivity issues. (One-time action)

network.title: Disable TCP Auto-Tuning
network.description: Disables TCP receive window auto-tuning. May improve stability on some connections.

actions.command: netsh int tcp set global autotuninglevel=disabled

privacy_and_debloating.title: Disable Telemetry Services
privacy_and_debloating.description: Disables core data collection and diagnostic services.

privacy_and_debloating.title: Disable Telemetry Tasks
privacy_and_debloating.description: Disables scheduled tasks related to the Customer Experience Improvement Program.

privacy_and_debloating.title: Uninstall OneDrive
privacy_and_debloating.description: Completely removes OneDrive integration from the system. Requires restart.
privacy_and_debloating.warning: This will uninstall OneDrive. Ensure you have backed up your files.

gaming.title: Disable Xbox Game Bar
gaming.description: Disables the Xbox Game Bar and its background recording features.

gaming.title: Create & Activate Pro Power Plan
gaming.description: Creates a custom power plan optimized for maximum performance.

gaming.title: Disable Mouse Acceleration
gaming.description: Enforces a linear 1-to-1 mouse response curve for precision aiming.

system_and_updates.title: Block Windows Updates
system_and_updates.description: Disables the Windows Update services to prevent automatic OS updates.

system_and_updates.title: Disable Fast Startup
system_and_updates.description: Disables the hibernation-based fast startup for a full system shutdown.

system_and_updates.title: Clear Temporary Files
system_and_updates.description: Deletes files from the user's temporary directory. (One-time action)

explorer_and_context_menu.title: Restore Classic Context Menu
explorer_and_context_menu.description: Brings back the full right-click context menu from Windows 10.

explorer_and_context_menu.title: Restore Classic Explorer Ribbon
explorer_and_context_menu.description: Restores the more functional Windows 10 ribbon UI in File Explorer.

explorer_and_context_menu.title: Show File Extensions
explorer_and_context_menu.description: Makes File Explorer show file extensions (e.g., .txt, .exe) by default.

ui_and_experience.title: Disable All Notifications
ui_and_experience.description: Turns off all toast notifications from applications and the system.

ui_and_experience.title: Set Visual Effects to 'Best Performance'
ui_and_experience.description: Disables all UI animations and visual effects for maximum responsiveness.

ui_and_experience.title: Disable Lock Screen
ui_and_experience.description: Goes directly to the login screen on startup, skipping the lock screen image.
